Goldmark fails on 11 because it doesn't like slashes or spaces in ids.
-- parser.json --
{"HeadingIDs": true}
-- 1.md --
# Heading
-- 1.html --
<h1>Heading</h1>
-- 2.md --
# Heading ###
-- 2.html --
<h1>Heading</h1>
-- 3.md --
# Heading {#id}
-- 3.html --
<h1 id="id">Heading</h1>
-- 4.md --
# Heading {#id} ##
-- 4.html --
<h1 id="id">Heading</h1>
-- 5.md --
# Heading {#id} more
-- 5.html --
<h1>Heading {#id} more</h1>
-- 6.md --
# Heading {nope}
-- 6.html --
<h1>Heading {nope}</h1>
-- 7.md --
# Heading {uhuh
-- 7.html --
<h1>Heading {uhuh</h1>
-- 8.md --
# {#no} Heading
-- 8.html --
<h1>{#no} Heading</h1>
-- 9.md --
# Heading {#id1} {#id2}
-- 9.html --
<h1 id="id2">Heading {#id1}</h1>
-- 10.md --
# Heading {#id1} {#id2
-- 10.html --
<h1>Heading {#id1} {#id2</h1>
-- 11.md --
# Heading {#a/b c}
-- 11.html --
<h1 id="a/b c">Heading</h1>
